A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This is the best movie ever made! (even better than \"Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back\"). The Narrative pacing is perfect and definitely does not feel inconsistent and messy! My favourite part is when Luke extracts green milk from the alien and then drinks it\, its so funny and one of the best scenes of the movie! I see no flaw with this film. Watch out \"The Godfather\"\, because there is a new best movie in town!!!
